text: Miyaanay marin dhulka oo eegin siday aheyd cidhibta kuwii ka horreeyay? Waxay ahaayeen kuwo ka xoog badan kuwakani awood ahaan, oo qoday dhulka oo u camiray si ka badan sida ay kuwani u camireen, oo waxaa halkaa ula yimid Rusushii loo soo diray xujooyin cad, oo Allaah ma ahayn mid ku gardarrooda, ee iyaga baa nafahooda ku gardarrooday
